nodes.text: Wizard's Tower was the communications pod of the Invisible Hand, a Separatist Providence-class Dreadnought present during the Battle of Coruscant. A section of the tower was outfitted by Count Dooku, a Sith apprentice.

During the battle, Chancellor Sheev Palpatine was kidnapped by General Grievous and placed in the tower; however, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker managed to locate him with R2-D2, and managed to rescue him from the General's clutches.
